name: Cats vs Birds
description:
For years the birds have been hogging the spotlight, arrogantly flapping their wings high up in the sky as the cats sat in dark alleyways looking up with envy. Until now, that is...

Join three crazy cats on a mission to rise to glory and a quest to reclaim the skies, one high-rise neighborhood at a time in Cats vs. Birds!

Jump off skyscrapers and aim for those pesky birds.
Tap the cats to keep them from tumbling down.
Knock all the birds out of the sky before the time runs out.
Take over New Jersey and unlock the survival mode!
